title: A company worth billions can't create a equal and balanced game
body: It is truly unfortunate that every game this season you have to rely on the better jungler to win. It truly breaks my heart to see that riot games is so incompetent to actually have a game that is so unbalanced that it can be decided every single game on jungler difference.

replies.body:
i mean, you make it sound easy to balance it. tell me, how would you balance:

200+ items
150 champions (while trying to keep one role  they play balanced if another needs to be nerfed)
runes/summoners.

its not as cut and dry as you make it seem.
Maybe not biting off more than you can chew is the best way to start.

What makes you think they even want to balance it? Balance isn't exciting. Irelia murdering everyone is exciting. Akali being untouchable until her team loses is exciting. Sylas having five different random ults every match is exciting. Rengar deleting someone is exciting. Whenever someone buys a skin or a Worlds passes, that sends a message to Riot that they're doing it right. Riot is a business and it _owns_ LoL. It's not an athletic organization for a sport.

They should hire more people who play specific roles/champion pools so if they have to change certain champions they could asks these experts on this champions rather than just looking at stats and numbers when changing champs.
I have the feeling that no one at league plays Juggernauts for example.
